item.title: hugo网站配置聊天
item.description: 地址 http://dashboard.daovoice.io 配置 注册 运用设置 复制到头部 1 <script>(function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i["DaoVoiceObject"]=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){(i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;a.charset="utf-8";m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)})(window,document,"script",('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https:' : 'http:') + "//widget.daovoice.io/widget/9e961453.js","daovoice")</script> 复制到末尾 1 2 3 4 5 6 <script> daovoice('init', { app_id: "9e961453" }); daovoice('update'); </script> hugo 复制第一个到 themes/layouts/partials/head.html hugo 复制第二个到 themes/layouts/partials/footer.html
